document.full_text: omani security forces arrested dozens of protesters demanding jobs and higher salaries in salalah on saturday, witnesses said, after a wave of arrests in the southern port city in recent days.
document.title: omani forces arrest protesters after clashes
lines_and_colors: omani security forces arrested dozens of protesters demanding jobs and higher salaries in salalah on saturday, witnesses said, after a wave of arrests in the southern port city in recent days.
